short_description: mahour co. is a meat production & processing company based in tehran, iran.
long_description: our company was founded in 2006 by the engineer nader jalali called mahour food processing. our products are manufactured and supplied by poplos brand. we have provided a variety of delicious and healthy dishes for the dear consumers with chicken meat, meat, fish, shrimp and vegetables. we have been honored to receive the title of best food and drug factory since 2009 and we got grade first of the standard production. the award of the health award in 2012, the selection of the food processor processing company as a unit for the conversion of jihad organization agriculture in 2010, obtaining a sanitary permit from the food and drug administration for all products, obtaining the standard iranian mark, and iso 9001: 2008 international quality management certificates, haccp for food safety, and the halal indemnity are our other honors.
business_tags: food and drug administration | organic farms | food processors | food process | meats & fish | food safety | beverage manufacturing | food production | chicken and meat
generated_description: mahour food processing is a company founded in 2006 by engineer nader jalali. they specialize in manufacturing and supplying a variety of delicious and healthy dishes under the poplos brand. their product range includes chicken meat, meat, fish, shrimp, and vegetables. in 2009, they were awarded the title of best food and drug factory and received the first grade of standard production. they have also received the health award in 2012 and were selected as a unit for the conversion of jihad organization agriculture in 2010. additionally, they have obtained a sanitary permit from the food and food administration for all their products, the standard iranian mark, and various international quality management certifications such as iso 9001:2008, haccp for food safety, and halal indemnity.
generated_business_tags: iso 9001:2015 quality management | shrimp products | food and drug factory | food safety and haccp protection solutions | vegetable products | food production | chicken products | fish products

generated_description: mahour co., established in 2006 by engineer nader jalali, is a food processing company based in isfahan, iran. the company specializes in the production of a variety of healthy and delicious food products, including chicken, red meat, fish, eggs, and vegetables. mahour co. operates a modern facility equipped with advanced food processing equipment, including automated fish processing lines and high-standard cold storage facilities. the company adheres to national and international health standards and has received several awards and certifications, including the iso 9001:2008 quality management certification and the haccp food safety standard.
